column4: I need help I have  celron 400 w/64MB ram, and I downloaded xbuntu because of its low specs, it starts to load with the bouncing bar and logo, then goes to a black screen with a blinking "_" in the top left and sits there, doing nothing
I also tried graphics safe mode, same sympton
thats a VERY low memory system.. You may want to try out some of the very minimal linux disrtos like "DSL" or "PuppyLinux"
but your poblem, sounds more like the systems not reading the cd right, or badly burnt cd
